TheHunted:BarTheDoorPower.NAME: Bar the Door
DESCRIPTIONS: You'll heal for 10 if the Warden is very far behind you at the end of combat.

TheHunted:EerieGlowPower.NAME: Eerie Glow
TheHunted:EerieGlowPower.FLAVOR: You pulse intermittently, like a cheap neon sign in a red light district.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your unblocked attacks randomly apply vulnerable, frail, or weak.

TheHunted:HereGoesNothingPower.NAME: Here goes nothing...
TheHunted:HereGoesNothingPower.FLAVOR: You're flying higher than an eagle. Also, you may die.
DESCRIPTIONS: If the Warden catches you this turn, you die.

TheHunted:ImmuneResponsePower.NAME: Immune Response
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain a debuff, also gain a random buff of equal length.

TheHunted:PerseverancePower.NAME: Perseverance
TheHunted:PerseverancePower.FLAVOR: You're showing neither pain nor fear.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your deck, gain ground.

TheHunted:PrototypeTurretPower.NAME: Prototype Turret
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal
damage to a random enemy. Hopefully it doesn't hit you instead.

TheHunted:RecklessFrailtyPower.NAME: Reckless Frailty
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, you'll apply
frail to yourself.

TheHunted:RecklessVulnerabilityPower.NAME: Reckless Vulnerability
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, you'll apply
vulnerability to yourself.

TheHunted:RecklessWeaknessPower.NAME: Reckless Weakness
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, you'll apply
weakness to yourself.

TheHunted:WardenPower.NAME: The Warden's Pursuit
DESCRIPTIONS: The Warden
is very far behind you.
is far behind you.
is slowly getting closer to you.
is close behind you.
is almost on top of you!
caught you!
